001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
004
005import javax.swing.*;
006import java.awt.*;
007import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
008import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
009import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
010import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
011import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
012import java.io.IOException;
013import java.util.*;
014
015/**
016 * A <code>StudentsList</code> is a <code>JList</code> that lists all
017 * of the students in a <code>GradeBook</code> sorted alphabetically
018 * by their last name.
019 */
020@SuppressWarnings("serial")
021public class StudentsList extends JPanel {
022  private static final int SORT_BY_NAME = 1;
023  private static final int SORT_BY_ID = 2;
024
025  private JList list;
026
027  private int howSorted;
028  private ArrayList<Student> studentsByName;
029  private ArrayList<Student> studentsById;
030
031  
032
033  /**
034   * Creates a <code>StudentsList</code> and sets up some initial
035   * parameters.
036   */
037  public StudentsList() {
038    this.howSorted = SORT_BY_NAME;
039
040    // Create the JList
041    this.list = new JList();
042    this.list.setSelectionMode(ListSelectionModel.SINGLE_SELECTION);
043    this.list.clearSelection();
044
045    // Wrap a ScrollPane around it
046    JScrollPane scrollPane = new JScrollPane(this.list);
047
048    // Create the toggle buttons
049    JRadioButton byName = new JRadioButton("By Name");
050    byName.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
051        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
052          StudentsList.this.howSorted = SORT_BY_NAME;
053          StudentsList.this.displayStudents();
054        }
055      });
056    if (this.howSorted == SORT_BY_NAME) {
057      byName.setSelected(true);
058    }
059
060    JRadioButton byId = new JRadioButton("By ID");
061    byId.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
062        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
063          StudentsList.this.howSorted = SORT_BY_ID;
064          StudentsList.this.displayStudents();
065        }
066      });
067    if (this.howSorted == SORT_BY_ID) {
068      byId.setSelected(true);
069    }
070
071    ButtonGroup bg = new ButtonGroup();
072    bg.add(byName);
073    bg.add(byId);
074
075    JPanel buttonPanel = new JPanel();
076    buttonPanel.setLayout(new FlowLayout());
077    buttonPanel.add(byName);
078    buttonPanel.add(byId);
079
080
081    // Add the components to this JPanel
082    this.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
083    this.add(scrollPane, BorderLayout.CENTER);
084    this.add(buttonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Reads the contents of a <code>GradeBook</code> and sorts
089   * <code>Student</code>s accordingly.
090   */
091  public void setGradeBook(GradeBook book) {
092    SortedSet<Student> sortedByName = new TreeSet<Student>(new Comparator<Student>() {
093        // Sort by last names
094        public int compare(Student o1, Student o2) {
095          String lastName1 = o1.getLastName();
096          String lastName2 = o2.getLastName();
097
098          if (!lastName1.equalsIgnoreCase(lastName2)) {
099            return lastName1.compareTo(lastName2);            
100          }
101
102          String firstName1 = ((Student) o1).getFirstName();
103          String firstName2 = ((Student) o2).getFirstName();
104
105          if (!firstName1.equalsIgnoreCase(firstName2)) {
106            return firstName1.compareTo(firstName2);            
107          }
108
109          String fullName1 = ((Student) o1).getFullName();
110          String fullName2 = ((Student) o2).getFullName();
111          return fullName1.compareTo(fullName2);
112        }
113
114        public boolean equals(Object o) {
115          return true;
116        }
117      });
118
119    SortedSet<Student> sortedById = new TreeSet<Student>(new Comparator<Student>() {
120        // Sort by ids
121        public int compare(Student o1, Student o2) {
122          String id1 = o1.getId();
123          String id2 = o2.getId();
124          return id1.compareTo(id2);
125        }
126
127        public boolean equals(Object o) {
128          return true;
129        }
130      });
131
132    book.forEachStudent(student -> {
133      sortedByName.add(student);
134      sortedById.add(student);
135    });
136
137    this.studentsByName = new ArrayList<Student>();
138    this.studentsByName.addAll(sortedByName);
139
140    this.studentsById = new ArrayList<Student>();
141    this.studentsById.addAll(sortedById);
142
143    this.displayStudents();
144  }
145
146  /**
147   * Returns a <code>ArrayList</code> of the <code>Student</code>s
148   * currently being displayed sorted by the currently selected
149   * criterion.
150   */
151  private ArrayList getList() {
152    switch(this.howSorted) {
153    case SORT_BY_NAME:
154      return this.studentsByName;
155    case SORT_BY_ID:
156      return this.studentsById;
157    default:
158      return new ArrayList();
159    }
160  }
161  
162  /**
163   * Adds the students in the current grade book to the list in the
164   * appropriate sorted order.
165   */
166  private void displayStudents() {
167    ArrayList list = this.getList();
168    Object[] array = new Object[list.size()];
169
170    Iterator iter = list.iterator();
171    for (int i = 0; iter.hasNext(); i++) {
172      Student student = (Student) iter.next();
173      array[i] = student.getFullName() + " (" + student.getId() + ")";
174    }
175    
176    this.list.setListData(array);
177    this.list.clearSelection();
178  }
179
180  /**
181   * Test program that reads a grade book from an XML file and
182   * displays the students in it using a <code>StudentsList</code>.
183   */    
184  public static void main(String[] args) {
185    if (args.length < 1) {
186      System.err.println("** usage: java StudentsList xmlFile");
187      System.exit(1);
188    }
189
190    String fileName = args[0];
191
192    GradeBook book = null;
193    try {
194      XmlGradeBookParser parser = new XmlGradeBookParser(fileName);
195      book = parser.parse();
196
197    } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
198      System.err.println("** Could not find file: " + ex.getMessage());
199      System.exit(1);
200      
201    } catch (IOException ex) {
202      System.err.println("** IOException during parsing: " + ex.getMessage());
203      System.exit(1);
204
205    } catch (ParserException ex) {
206      System.err.println("** Error during parsing: " + ex);
207      System.exit(1);
208    }
209
210    StudentsList list = new StudentsList();
211    list.setGradeBook(book);
212
213    JFrame frame = new JFrame("StudentsList test");
214    frame.addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {
215        public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
216          System.exit(1);
217        }
218      });
219
220    frame.getContentPane().add(list);
221    
222    frame.pack();
223    frame.setVisible(true);
224  }
225}
